website_summaries.verdict: Sennheiser's pricey HD 630VB headphones deliver a wonderful audio experience with adjustable bass and a supremely comfortably fit.
pros: Excellent audio performance with crisp, detailed highs and adjustable bass response, ranging from thin to booming

customer_reviews.title: Quality Sound and Craftsmanship
customer_reviews.text: I am amazed by the quality of the sound. I have owned a few different kinds of headphones, but these are by far the best. There are so many background pieces in songs that I have never heard that I can now hear with these Sennheisers. The quality is also really nice- all aluminum frame. It does have a non-detachable cable, but as long as you're careful it shouldn't be a problem. In addition, the clamping force is pretty strong coming out of the box, so I would personally advise carefully placing the headphones over something to stretch it out to avoid any earaches.
customer_reviews.author: Rockfan19

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great- but heavy and narrow head cushion causes discomfort.
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is very nice overall and the fit and finish is on point. I can't fault the features, sound quality and overall tactile feel of these units. My largest gripe is the overall weight of the unit and the thin head support cushion. As someone who regularly keeps a shaved head- these two points are a deal breaker as they just aren't comfortable for anything over 10 minutes or so.
customer_reviews.author: ZeroDrift

customer_reviews.title: Best Headphones I've Ever Had
customer_reviews.text: I own several pairs of Sennheiser and JBL headphones. These top them all. Granted, I have not purchased the HD 700 to compare, but I doubt they're worth almost twice the price. The sound is crisp and clear, the base is outstanding and perfectly executed. In addition, they are SUPER comfortable. I do wish the wire was removable, which is why I gave it 4* instead of 5*.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for moible usage, Great sound
customer_reviews.text: These pair of headphones are stunning. Construction screams quality and they are light enough to be able to wear for hours on end. The sound is amazing, and the variable bass is fantastic for EDM and other bass heavy music. All around, these are great headphones that will wow you to the max, albeit a bit pricey.
customer_reviews.author: Only me.

customer_reviews.title: BUY IT!
customer_reviews.text: Just buy it! Seriously buy it! The sound is amazing even without any additional products (equalizer or amplifier). The Variable Bass dial is such an awesome feature to the headphone even though I have it permanently set near max! To enhance your experience buy an equalizer app on your mobile device to really tap into the full potential of the headphones. Higher bit rate music also enhances your experience!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sound quality and the variable bass feature is a ...
customer_reviews.text: These are the headphones that I have been looking for! Great sound quality and the variable bass feature is a real plus. The build quality is excellent and the variable bass control has a smooth feel and is easy to adjust. My music library is on my iPhone and I enjoy listening while doing things around the house so I thought the cable would be too short but in real use it's the perfect length, doesn't get caught on on things like my Bose QC 15. Bottom line is they are very much worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald

customer_reviews.title: Best Sound You Have Ever Heard
customer_reviews.text: Best sound you have ever heard, except they take a lot of power to make them loud. Have not tried them with Apple laptop yet. Volume only works with Apple I think. Variable bass always works and of course, mine is at MAX. ! Cord is VERY short so I bought an extension here at Amazon for about 6 dollars.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Cillford

customer_reviews.title: A step up from Beats.
customer_reviews.text: Good all around headphones.They do sound better if you add a headphone amp. Otherwise clear well balanced sound. The bass adjustment to me is barely noticeable. That’s just my opinion. Maybe you do not agree.... Give a listen to some of them if you do desire.
customer_reviews.author: Music Mel

customer_reviews.title: Broken headphones
customer_reviews.text: It looks like the headphones, before sending, someone already opened and used. An hour after the first listening to the headphones, the right earphone stopped working. After checking in the sennheiser service centre, it was found that it was defective headphones. The service centre replaced the broken headphones with new ones.
customer_reviews.author: Dina

customer_reviews.title: The music itself is okay, but the volume controls ...
customer_reviews.text: The music itself is okay, but the volume controls did not work and the bass control was not linear. Returned it to amazon
customer_reviews.author: Wolf

customer_reviews.title: Well built, comfortable, good sound
customer_reviews.text: I like the sound quality of these cans, and the high-quality materials and construction. Circuit City delivered on time; good packaging; good service.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Murray

customer_reviews.title: Big and high quality.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Larger and heavier than expected. Not good for carrying or travel. These are studio, office use. Too big to listen to music in bed.
customer_reviews.author: KM

customer_reviews.title: My Son Loves These
customer_reviews.text: High-end headphones, but I personally like V-Moda even better. Takes nothing away from these fine headphones!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... bit small for my taste but it is a pretty good pair of cans
customer_reviews.text: Upper frequencies are a bit exaggerated & the pads are a bit small for my taste but it is a pretty good pair of cans. Listen before you buy if you can
customer_reviews.author: rasta

customer_reviews.title: the bass is bad a@&, I don’t care what audiophiles have to ...
customer_reviews.text: These headphones rock, the bass is bad a@&, I don’t care what audiophiles have to say, these are truly impressive! I listen to Breaking Benjamin, Lyndsey sterling, and everything in between, bass dial all the way up!!
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievable Headphones
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are unbelievable, I have been looking for a set that can integrate with my portable devices and give the super high quality sound at the same time. Slightly pricy, but really worth every penney
customer_reviews.author: Larry D.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sound and fits very well
customer_reviews.text: Amazing sound and fits very well. The adjustable base is VERY useful, it let u tune it up or down for different types of music.
customer_reviews.author: CK

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the conversion of digital back to analog
customer_reviews.text: I paired these headphones with the dragonfly converter and getting great sound. They are also comforter for the long flights.
customer_reviews.author: James D Wright

customer_reviews.title: Great buy.
customer_reviews.text: This is what I was expecting. Good quality sound and the retro look is a bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Arturo Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound quality!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sound quality. I still hear new things in music I’ve listened to for 30 years. A little cumbersome to travel with but also worth the trouble.
customer_reviews.author: RRRVP

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Look, Feel, Sound are all top notch. Did not disappoint!
customer_reviews.author: ChrisJones

customer_reviews.title: Astounding sound capabilities for this price - it's a great value & reliable product
customer_reviews.text: Astounding sound capabilities for this price - it's a great value & reliable product, it'd redefine your portable music experience.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sound for daily use
customer_reviews.text: Bought these headphones for work since I couldn't use the 530's. They sound great! Not quite as good as open ears for classical music, but great for general listening on other styles of music. I usually have the vb setting at 2 notches above 0.
customer_reviews.author: MikeSL

customer_reviews.title: Pricey but worth every penny.
customer_reviews.text: The sound is just brilliant. I can hear individual instruments that were unnoticed previously.
customer_reviews.author: Stuart Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Featuring: Bass adjustment
customer_reviews.text: Nice sound! The bass adjustment is better than I expect.
customer_reviews.author: Renjun CHeng

customer_reviews.title: The cable really is short
customer_reviews.text: The cable really is short; fine if you're using it on a phone I guess, but not if you're pluging it into a DAC that sits on your PC under the desk.
customer_reviews.author: RP

customer_reviews.title: Do not think you can do better with a set of low impedance headphones
customer_reviews.text: Do not think you can do better with a set of low impedance headphones. Driving them with a LG -V20 with a hi -fi output which helps :)
customer_reviews.author: Norman Suffern

customer_reviews.title: Decent...not Great Headphones
customer_reviews.text: Overall these headphones were ok... They produce an acceptable soundstage...although I felt the midtones were somewhat "muddled". The bass controls are good...but I have heard headphones with better, tighter sounding bass. One problematic area of these headphones is the cord...it is woefully short. Lastly...after less than two weeks one of the ear pads has become detached and will not consistently stay attached to the headset. I am returning these headphones to Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Traylorc

customer_reviews.title: Great service and love the product and AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: The product looked brand new...could hardly see any markings on the product....Great service and love the product and AWESOME price
customer_reviews.author: Scott Hills

customer_reviews.title: High quality headphones/Flimsy cable
customer_reviews.text: They really do sound amazing. They would have been 5-star but the cable is so terrible. Why put an extremely cheap cable on a $500 pair of headphones? My cable(just as I figured) started shorting out within a week and since the cable is not detachable and cannot be easily replaced, I get to look forward to dealing with getting a new pair every time this happens or eventually ask for a refund. Neither of which is exciting for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't Fear The Dial
customer_reviews.text: These are currently truly my favorite headphones. I was looking for closed-backed Sennheisers for ambient noise control but was a little freaked out at the idea of a bass dial. I shouldn't have worried, for me it is a set-it-and-forget-it affair mostly, but I do pump up the bass for certain techno tracks. These cans sound either more balanced or better resolving to me than many other highly regarded phones, including the Audioquest Nighthawks, NAD Viso HP50, Focal Spirit One S, all of which I do still like and listen to regularly.
customer_reviews.author: jhanken

customer_reviews.title: i tried these on for a few minutes
customer_reviews.text: im not an expert, and i tried these on for a few minutes. i got sibilance on the "beep" on crystal methods high roller. when i turned the bass dial all the way up, there wasnt that much bass at all. these are only $250 now which is much cheaper than what they used to sell for, so it may be good value; get an opinion from someone who knows.
customer_reviews.author: rise up

customer_reviews.title: A fantastic but slightly flawed headphone.
customer_reviews.text: I did a video review of this product here:  Pros: Awesome audio quality. Very portable and would be a godsend for those wanting high quality audio on the go. Sturdy. Cons: The cable. For 549 dollars this should have been detachable or at least made of a better/more durable material. The mids are also slightly recessed but that's subjective to the user. Also it does tend to get uncomfortable for extended use. Summary: Can't beat it for portable use, think about something else if you want to use it at home.
customer_reviews.author: Nanda Panda Tech

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, but with one minor headset issue.
customer_reviews.text: I'm a headphone geek and these sound very good. The variable bass is done very well and they get nice & loud with my iPhone 6s. However, there's one problem: when using them as a headset, it's a bit difficult to clearly hear your own voice. These are solid, large, over-the-ear headphones and so are very good at keeping out external noise/sound... including my own voice. I wish Sennheiser would feed the microphone audio back to the drivers so that we can hear ourselves in the audio. hint hint.
customer_reviews.author: dorkboy

customer_reviews.title: They are wired. Would like to see in wireless.
customer_reviews.text: This headphones are great. Have very clear sound. Gets an A.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Zirbes

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice design, however the quality of the sound wasn't as good as I expected.
customer_reviews.author: ISBEL PINEIRO

product_meta.title: Sennheiser HD 630VB Headphone with Variable Bass and Call Control (Discontinued by Manufacturer)
product_meta.description: The Sennheiser HD 630VB is a closed-back, around ear audiophile headphone with variable bass adjustment and call control. It offers an audiophile listening experience, with the dynamic bass sound that listeners demand. Styled with Sennheiser' s clean, contemporary design ethos, the HD 630VB is crafted from premium materials including strong, lightweight aluminum ear cups, yokes and sliders. The adjustable headband makes it easy to achieve the perfect fit and soft ear pads make even longer periods of listening comfortable. Bass can be adjusted through a rotary dial on the ear cup, which also feature remote controls for music and taking calls via the inline microphone on the cable, allowing for headset use with selected smart devices.
feature_bullets: Closed-back around ear audiophile headphone featuring a collapsible design for maximum portability.
Premium materials used throughout including aluminum ear cups, yokes and sliders for durability and reliability.
Innovative rotary variable bass control for customizing low frequency response.
Integrated controls on the ear cup for music and call control, selectable for iOS (Apple) and Android (Samsung Galaxy) devices.
2 year warranty when purchased from an authorized Sennheiser dealer.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars66 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
